remarks: Value of a function given in maps-to notation, using explicit class substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fvmpts.1 $e |- F = ( x e. C |-> B ) $.
fvmpts $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ [_ A / x ]_ B e. V ) -> ( F ` A ) = [_ A / x ]_ B ) $.
$d C x $.
